baseline_texts: The frame shows an indoor scene with a doorway that opens to a staircase leading upward, illuminated by bright natural light. Inside the room, a person is partially visible on the left side, holding a white sneaker. The room itself appears dimly lit compared to the bright stairway outside. The walls are plain, and a dark surface, possibly a piece of furniture or the floor, is visible in the foreground.

This frame shows an indoor setting with a staircase leading upward in the background. The staircase has wooden steps and a handrail on the right side. To the left of the staircase is a closed wooden door. In the foreground on the left side, a hand is holding a white sneaker with three velcro straps. The lighting is brighter near the staircase, while the room itself is dimly lit.

This frame shows a person holding a white sneaker in their hand. The background features an interior space with a wooden door that is open, revealing a staircase going upwards on the right side. The lighting coming from the staircase area is bright, contrasting with the relatively dim interior room. The person's upper body is partially visible on the left side of the frame.

The frame shows a person holding a white sneaker in their left hand. The background features a doorway with a wooden door that is open, revealing a brightly lit staircase leading upward. The walls and stairs are light-colored, contrasting with the darker floor inside the room where the person is standing. The lighting suggests that natural light is coming from the stairway area.

This frame shows an indoor scene with a person partially visible on the left side, holding a light-colored sneaker in their hand. In the background, there is a wooden door that is open, revealing a staircase with light shining down from above. The walls and floor are plain and unadorned. The lighting creates a contrast between the darker interior foreground and the brightly lit staircase area.

The image shows an indoor scene with a staircase leading upwards, illuminated by natural light. There is a wooden door to the right of the image, which is open, revealing the staircase. The walls are plain white or light-colored. On the left side of the image, there is a partially visible person whose upper body and arm are blurred due to motion. The floor appears to be dark-colored, possibly tiled. Near the bottom left corner, some objects are visible but indistinct, including what seems to be a bag or backpack.

The frame shows an interior space with a view of a wooden staircase. The stairs are well-lit, possibly from natural light coming from above or near the stairs. A wooden door is open, revealing the staircase. Part of a personâ€™s arm and torso is visible on the left side of the image, partially out of the frame. The walls are plain and light-colored, and there is minimal furniture or decoration visible in the room. There is a small black object on the floor near the corner, but it is not clearly identifiable.

The frame shows a view of an interior space with a staircase leading upwards. The staircase is well-lit from above, possibly by natural light. There is an open wooden door with paneling leading to the staircase. The room visible in the foreground appears to be minimally furnished, with a dark bag or object on the floor near the left wall. The walls are plain and light-colored, giving the space a simple, clean look. The overall scene has a quiet and empty atmosphere.
